recipes.ingredients: 1 1/2 c Cooked halibut; flaked 1/2 c Chili sauce 1 tb Prepared white horseradish 1 tb Fresh lemon juice 1 ts Salt 1/8 ts Pepper 4 Lettuce leaves; shredded

recipes.name: Halibut Skewers [barbecue or broil]
recipes.directions: Whisk together Dijon-style mustard, melted butter, honey and lemon juice. Season halibut steaks with salt and pepper. Brush both sides of halibut steaks with honey-mustard mixture. Cut halibut steaks into 1-inch [2.5-cm] chunks; thread onto skewers, alternately with an assortment of cut vegetables. Barbecue or broil, until done.
recipes.ingredients: 1/4 cup [60 mL] Dijon-style mustard 1/4 cup [60 mL] melted butter 2 tablespoons [30 mL] honey 2 teaspoons [10 mL] lemon juice 6 [4 to 6-ounce each] halibut steaks Salt Black pepper Assortment of vegetables, for skewering

recipes.name: Halibut with brie and toasted pecans
recipes.directions:
Dust halibut in flour. Shake off excess.
Heat butter in saute pan.
Add halibut and saute until golden brown or both sides.
Add whipping cream and brie pieces.
Bring to boil and reduce by one third by cooking until sauce thickens, approximately 2-3 min.
Add wine and serve topped with pecans.
recipes.ingredients:
1 lb. fresh halibut fillets or chunks
1/2 cup flour 1 Tbl. clarified butter 3/4 whipping cream 1/4 lb. brie (cut into pieces) 1/8 cup white wine 1/4 cup toasted pecans

recipes.name: Herb-Roasted Mediterranean Vegetables
recipes.directions:
Toss veggie with oil garlic, rosemary and salt. Place in 15x10x1" baking pan.
Bake at 375 for 40 min. or until veggies are tender, stirring occasionally.
Sprinkle with cheese.
recipes.ingredients: 8 c. assorted vegetables pieces (suchas eggplant, zucchini, onions, carrots and green peppers) 1/4 d. EVOO 2 cloves garlic, minced 2 tsp. dried rosemary leaves 1 tsp. salt 1/2 c. shredded parmesan cheese

recipes.name: Herbed Tomato Soup with Pasta
recipes.directions:
Combine broth, diced russet potato, 1/4 c. green onion, chopped fresh parsley, chopped garlic, dried thyme and dried sage in large dutch oven. Simmer over medium heat until potato is tender about 15 min. Add spicy veggie juice and pasta; simmer until pasta is tender, stirring occasionally. about 8 min. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Ladle soup into bowl. Garnish with remaining 1/4 cup green onion. Sprinkle cheese and croutons over if desired.
recipes.ingredients: 5 C. canned chicken broth 1 large russet potato, peeled, diced 1/2 c. chopped green onions 1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley 4 large garlic cloves, chopped 1 tsp. dried thyme 1 tsp. dried sage 2 C. spicy veggie juice 1 C. small dried pasta (such as elbow macaroni) 2 fresh tomatoes 1 can tomato paste

recipes.name: Homemade Soft Pretzels
recipes.directions:
Combine the water, sugar and kosher salt in the bowl of a stand mixer and sprinkle the yeast on top. Allow to sit for 5 minutes or until the mixture begins to foam. Add the flour and butter and, using the dough hook attachment, mix on low speed until well combined. Change to medium speed and knead until the dough is smooth and pulls away from the side of the bowl, approximately 4 to 5 minutes. Remove the dough from the bowl, clean the bowl and then oil it well with vegetable oil. Return the dough to the bowl, cover with plastic wrap and sit in a warm place for approximately 50 to 55 minutes or until the dough has doubled in size.
Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Line 2 half-sheet pans with parchment paper and lightly brush with the vegetable oil. Set aside.
Bring the 10 cups of water and the baking soda to a rolling boil in an 8-quart saucepan or roasting pan.
In the meantime, turn the dough out onto a slightly oiled work surface and divide into 8 equal pieces. Roll out each piece of dough into a 24-inch rope. Make a U-shape with the rope, holding the ends of the rope, cross them over each other and press onto the bottom of the U in order to form the shape of a pretzel. Place onto the parchment-lined half sheet pan.
Place the pretzels into the boiling water, 1 by 1, for 30 seconds. Remove them from the water using a large flat spatula. Return to the half sheet pan, brush the top of each pretzel with the beaten egg yolk and water mixture and sprinkle with the pretzel salt. Bake until dark golden brown in color, approximately 12 to 14 minutes. Transfer to a cooling rack for at least 5 minutes before serving.
recipes.ingredients: 1 1/2 cups warm (110 to 115 degrees F) water 1 tablespoon sugar 2 teaspoons kosher salt 1 package active dry yeast 22 ounces all-purpose flour, approximately 4 1/2 cups 2 ounces unsalted butter, melted Vegetable oil, for pan 10 cups water 2/3 cup baking soda 1 large egg yolk beaten with 1 tablespoon water Pretzel salt

recipes.name: Honey Bee Cookies
recipes.directions:
Heat oven to 375.
Beat butter, brown sugar, honey and egg in a medium bowl on medium speed, scraping bowl constantly, until smooth. Stir in remaining ingredients.
Drop the dough by teaspoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake until set and light brown around edges (surfaces of cookies will appear shiny), 7 to 9 min. Immediately after removing from oven sprinkle with cinnamon-sugar. Let stand 3 to 5 min. before removing from cookie sheet. Place cookie on wire rack to cool.
recipes.ingredients: 1/2 C. butter 1/2 C. packed brown sugar 1/2 C. honey 1 egg 1 1/2 C. flour 1/2 tsp. baking soda 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon

recipes.name: Honey Sesame Chicken
recipes.directions:
Mix flour and sesame seeds in medium bowl; set aside. Mix mustard and honey in small bowl. Brush chicken with mustard mixture; coat well with sesame seed mixture.
Heat oil in large skillet on medium heat. Add chicken; cook 4 to 5 minutes on each side or until coating is deep golden brown and chicken is no longer pink inside.
Prepare couscous as directed on paackage, adding zucchini and lemon juice afer stirring couscous into boiling liquid. Serve chicken with hot couscous mixture.
recipes.ingredients: 1/4 c. all purpose flour 1/4 c. sesame seeds 2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard 1 Tbsp honey 4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves (about 1 1/4 lbs.) 2 Tbsp. Extra Virgin olive oil 1 pkg. Near East Herbed Chicken Couscous mix 2 medium zucchini, cut in quarters, lenghwise and sliced into 1/4 inch (about 2 cups)
